recipes.title: Pizza Recipe
recipes.description: Delicious pizza recipe with a twist!

instructions.title: Prepare the Dough
instructions.description: To prepare the dough, mix flour, yeast, water, and salt in a bowl. Knead the dough until smooth. Cover and let it rise for 1 hour.

instructions.title: Make the Sauce
instructions.description: To make the sauce, combine tomato sauce, olive oil, garlic, and Italian seasoning in a saucepan. Simmer for 15 minutes.

instructions.title: Assemble and Bake
instructions.description: Roll out the dough, spread the sauce, and add toppings. Bake in a preheated oven at 220Â°C for 15 minutes.
